GUI programming Recipe Search Engine
Please enter recipe title! Please wait! Enter recipe title Search Favourites Recipe added to favourites! Failed to add! Recipe removed from favourites! Failed to remove! Publisher: Author Version number OK How to use Visit Source link Visit publisher link Save to Favourites Remove from favourites Social Rank: Help On the search screen, enter recipe title to search. The list of search result will be shown. Tap on list item to view details. On the details screen, Click on Save to Favourites to save recipe detail offline. To view list of saved recipes, click on Favourites button to view a list of saved recipes.
